attributes.additional_details:
We would like resolution in the British Parliament :-
1. For apology of KOMAGATAMARU (www.komagatamaru2014.com) Killings on 26th September 1914 at Budge Budge ghatt Kolkata India.
2. For apology of Mrs Thatchers govt. decision to assist Mrs Indira Gandi govt. during Indian army invasion on Golden Temple Amritsar India.
3.To form a committee with the involvement of Sikhs for an independent and full public inquiry of UK involvement 1984.
4. To support on govt. level for an international UN led inquiry into Genocide of Sikhs from 1976.
5. To build up diplomatic pressure on India govt. to eliminate blacklist, all fictitious political motivated cases registered on Sikhs worldwide (www.sikhprisoners.com) and release all Sikh Political Prisoners.
